p: IFN-I induction has been shown in YF17D-vaccinated human subjects [ 249, 250] and combined IFN-I and -III are crucial for controlling YFV infection in mice [ 251]. Recently, it has been reported that cells infected with YFV stimulated pDCs to produce IFN-I in a TLR7- and cell contact-dependent manner. Cells producing immature particles as well as capsid-free viral RNA participated in pDC stimulation [ 252].
